title: I did not have Tutorial Reward Capsule.
body: I am a new player and I completed all 3 Tutorail training games, but I did not get the reward capsule. It showed I have already get the capsule, but I did not find it in my loot. Does someone have this trouble also? Where can I get this tutorial Reward Capsule?

replies.body:
> submitted 33 minutes ago in Teamfight Tactics

What exactly are you referring to?
